channel.title: Azure Flash News
channel.itunes:subtitle: A show about the weekly news around Microsoft's Cloud Platform, Azure
channel.itunes:author: Microsoft
channel.itunes:summary: A weekly show featuring news items and features about Microsoft's Cloud Platform, Azure
channel.description: A weekly show featuring news items and features about Microsoft's Cloud Platform, Azure
channel.itunes:keywords: Microsoft, Azure, News, Microsoft Azure, Azure Flash News

item.title: AFN: 2017-10-06
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2017-10-06
item.itunes:summary: On this episode Rick and Mark discuss the new real-time alerting in Azure, the announcement around Azure Building Blocks, how to provision on-demand Spark clusters using Azure Batch, the upcoming Azure OpenDev on October 25, 2017, some new VM images with SQL Server 2017, and a continued review of Ignite announcements.

item.title: AFN: 2017-10-13
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2017-10-13
item.itunes:summary: It was great to have Amanda back to host in Rick's absence. Amanda and mark discuss the new Action Groups capabilitie in Azure Alerts, the new X.509 CA support in Azure IoT Hub, new monitoring capabilities in Azure IoT Hub, Batch AI preview to bring GPU to your AI problem, share snapshots for Azure Files, and how Azure Security Center uses machine learning to enable adaptive application control.

item.title: AFN: 2017-10-20
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2017-10-20
item.itunes:summary: On today's episode, Azure Event Hubs geo-disaster recovery, the Cloud Service Map for Azure to AWS, Event Grid improvements, new capabilieies in Azure Storage Exporer around Cosmos DB, and new super secret workloads in Azure Government.

item.title: AFN: 2017-10-27
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2017-10-27
item.itunes:summary: Today we talked about Cray in Azure, the new fully managed Azure Kubernetes Service, new faster VM types on Azure, detecting malware on Azure, Azure Data Factory V2 capabilities, IoT hub and device twin.

item.title: AFN: 2017-11-03
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2017-11-03
item.itunes:summary: Today we welcome a guest host, Natalie Wood. Today, Mark and Natile discuss Azure Managed Applications out of the Azure Marketplace, the updated IoT Suite preconfigured solution for remote monitoring, some new offers in the Azure Martetplace, new threat detection capabilites for Azure Security Center for Linux, the Microsoft Data Accelerator Program, a little about enterprise Blockchain, and some announcements about Azure China.

item.title: AFN: 2017-11-17
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2017-11-17
item.itunes:summary: The week's news about Azure. November 17th, 2017.

item.title: AFN: 2017-12-01
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2017-12-01
item.itunes:summary: The week's news about Azure. December 1st, 2017.

item.title: AFN: 2017-12-08
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2017-12-08
item.itunes:summary: The week's news about Azure. December 8th, 2017.

item.title: AFN: 2017-12-15
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2017-12-15
item.itunes:summary: We welcome guest host, Doug Splinter to discuss with Rick about Azure Active Directory and how we cross over between Azure applications and Office 365. Also some news around subscription level budget APIs, as well as the General Availability of the Azure Bot Service and the Language Understanding.

item.title: AFN: 2018-01-05
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2018-01-05
item.itunes:summary: Today we discuss the new CPU vulnerability and the architectures that can protect you from outages due to reboots, the new asynchronous refresh API for Azure Analysis Services, an article from the Azure CAT team about designing, building, and operating microservices on Azure, the ability to build richer apps with your time series data on Azure.

item.title: AFN: 2018-01-12
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2018-01-12
item.itunes:summary: Today we discuss a way to auto-scale IoT capabilities, Azure Security Center's integration with App Gateway WAF, the new Linux Foundation course on Administering Linux in Azure, and the tried and true architecture - running web apps in multiple geographic locations.

item.title: AFN: 2018-01-19
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2018-01-19
item.itunes:summary: Today we had a guest host, Todd Kitta. We discussed Azure Security Center and custom security assessments, Azure CLI 2.0 IoT extension, and Azure Data Factory visual tools.

item.title: AFN: 2018-02-09
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2018-02-09
item.itunes:summary: Today Rick and Mark discuss new Video Indexer capabilities, some new stuff with serverless IoT, GA for Virtual Network Service Endpoints, Ansible for Azure, GA for Event Grid, a new updated Azure developer's guide e-book, Azure Bootcamp, Azure Security Center alerts to SEIM tools, new Stream Analytics capabilities, and zone redundant Virtual Machine Sets.

item.title: AFN: 2018-02-16
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2018-02-16
item.itunes:summary: The week's news about Azure. February 16th, 2018.

item.title: AFN: 2018-02-23
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2018-02-23
item.itunes:summary: The week's news about Azure. February 23rd, 2018.

item.title: AFN: 2017-11-10
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2017-11-10
item.itunes:summary: The week's news about Azure. November 10th, 2017.

item.title: AFN: 2018-03-02
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2018-03-02
item.itunes:summary: This week we have a guest host, Matt Lunzer. Mark and Matt talk about Azure Migrate, Security Center Playbooks, B series VMs in AKS, Service Bus integration with Event Grid, and some new capabilities with Azure Load Balancer.

item.title: AFN: 2018-03-09
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2018-03-09
item.itunes:summary: Today we had a guest host, Greg Hoelzer. Greg and Rick discussed some new capabilities in Azure Automation, a new article on Azure physical security, Spring Boot 2.0 and VSCode, faster metric alerts for Log Analytics, and SQL Information Protection.

item.title: AFN: 2018-03-16
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2018-03-16
item.itunes:summary: Today Rick and guest speaker Doug Splinter covered exciting new Azure announcements ranging from open sourcing a key Azure capability, to new features, to new regions available soon. Also, new features in Azure Active Directory B2C! Giddy up!

item.title: AFN: 2018-03-23
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2018-03-23
item.itunes:summary: Today Mark hosted the show and he talked about Event Hub integration with Spark, Terraform on the Marketplace, Columnstore in Azure SQL DB, SONiC, news for PostgreSQL and MySQL, a new book available about Serverless compute in Azure, GA of the new Alerts capability in Azure.

item.title: AFN: 2018-03-30
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2018-03-30
item.itunes:summary: Today Matt Lunzer and Greg Hoelzer hosted. They discussed an upcoming events, Global Azure Bootcamp and Build, console access to Virtual Machines, GA of Azure Files snapshot, soft delete for Azure Blob, Azure Load Balancer Standard, Azure DNS private zones, Service Fabric clusters from Visual Studio, and getting support for Azure IoT SDK.

item.title: AFN: 2018-04-06
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2018-04-06
item.itunes:summary: Today Rick and Mark discuss Application Security Groups GA, a Databricks and Azure Data Factory Architecture, a great article on dealing with unique device IDs in IoT Hub, using Informatica in Azure in modern data warehouse architectures, some new capabilities for SQL Elastic Pools, and an article that goes through how to integrate Key Vault with ARM Templates for web farm certificates in VM Scale Sets.

item.title: AFN: 2018-04-13
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2018-04-13
item.itunes:summary: Today Rick and Mark talk about using Data Factory CI, Azure SQL DB Geo-redundancy with Azure Key Vault, achieving GDPR compliance with Azure, a case study on Azure Data Warehouse with Rubikloud, and an awesome demo on DevOps projects from VSTS.

item.title: AFN: 2018-04-20
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2018-04-20
item.itunes:summary: Today Rick and Mark discuss creating Azure Subscriptions programmatically, TDE for Azure SQL DB with your own key, Azure DDoS protection Standard, Service Fabric Reliable Services on RHEL, and a demo of Azure Private DNS Zones.

item.title: AFN: 2018-05-04
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2018-05-04
item.itunes:summary: Today Rick and Mark chat about AzCopy on Linux GA, new capabilities for Azure SQL Data Warehouse, write acceleration for M Series VMs, global VN Peering GA in all regions, Microsoft Build next week, low priority VMs in Scale Sets, and an overview of what it takes to produce the website and podcast for Azure Flash News.

item.title: AFN: 2018-05-11
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2018-05-11
item.itunes:summary: Today Rick and Mark discuss a whole bunch of announcements from BUILD. This includes OpenShift in Azure, VNET Service Endpoints for Cosmos DB, video processing announcements, shared image gallery, AKS monitoring, Cogntive Search, a new async Java SDK for Cosmos DB, a roundup of networking announcements, and finally Azure Confidential Computing.

item.title: AFN: 2018-05-18
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2018-05-18
item.itunes:summary: The week's news about Azure. May 18th, 2018.

item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2018-06-01
item.itunes:summary: The week's news about Azure. June 1st, 2018.

item.title: AFN: 2018-06-08
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2018-06-08
item.itunes:summary: The week's news about Azure. June 8th, 2018.

item.title: AFN: 2018-06-15
item.itunes:author: Rick Weyenberg and Mark Garner
item.itunes:subtitle: AFN: 2018-06-15
item.itunes:summary: The week's news about Azure. June 15th, 2018. Today Mark and Amanda discuss the GA release of Azure Kubernetes Service, Blob lifecycle management, new advances in Azure Alerts, user-defined restore points for Azure SQL Datawarehouse, and SQL Backup.
